name: A Arjoon
bio: Arjoon is a seasoned technology leader with over 23 years of experience in enterprise software architecture and digital transformation. Starting his career at TCS in 2001, he has led multiple large-scale projects across banking, insurance, and telecommunications sectors. Known for his strategic vision and hands-on approach, Arjoon has mentored hundreds of engineers and built high-performing teams across Chennai and Bangalore. He holds certifications in cloud architecture, agile methodologies, and enterprise security. Outside work, he's passionate about education technology and volunteers with coding bootcamps for underprivileged students in Chennai.

name: Annamalai Natarajan
bio: Annamalai is a product engineering leader specializing in fintech and enterprise SaaS solutions. With 23+ years at Infosys, he has driven innovation in digital banking platforms serving millions of customers across Asia-Pacific. His expertise spans product strategy, engineering excellence, and customer-centric design. Annamalai has filed 8 patents in financial technology and speaks regularly at industry conferences on product innovation and agile at scale. He's particularly proud of launching UPI-integrated solutions that simplified digital payments for rural India. When not building products, he enjoys trekking in the Western Ghats and is an avid amateur photographer.

name: A S Syed Ahamed Khan
bio: Syed is a cloud solutions architect and technology evangelist with deep expertise in Azure, hybrid cloud, and enterprise migration strategies. Joining Microsoft in 2010 after a decade at Wipro, he has led cloud transformation initiatives for Fortune 500 companies and government entities across India and the Middle East. His team has successfully migrated over 500 enterprise workloads to cloud, saving clients millions in infrastructure costs. Syed is a published author on cloud security and a sought-after speaker at tech summits. He believes technology should be inclusive and accessible, and volunteers with NGOs to provide cloud training to engineering students from tier-2 cities.

name: Antony G Prakash
bio: Antony leads engineering teams at Zoho, focusing on building world-class productivity and collaboration tools for global markets. With 22 years in software development, he has contributed to products used by over 80 million users worldwide. His leadership philosophy emphasizes innovation, work-life balance, and nurturing talent from smaller cities - aligned with Zoho's unique culture. Antony has championed remote work and distributed teams long before the pandemic, enabling engineering talent from rural Tamil Nadu to work on cutting-edge products. He's passionate about sustainable technology and cricket, and coaches a local under-14 cricket team on weekends.

name: Abishek Valluru
bio: Abishek is an entrepreneur and data science pioneer who founded DataMatrix Analytics in 2015, a company specializing in AI-powered business intelligence for retail and e-commerce. After spending 15 years at Accenture and Deloitte consulting on analytics strategy, he took the leap into entrepreneurship. Today, DataMatrix serves over 200 clients across India and Southeast Asia, helping them unlock insights from data to drive revenue growth. Abishek is a frequent contributor to analytics journals and has been recognized as one of India's 'Top 40 Under 40' entrepreneurs. He's deeply committed to giving back, mentoring startup founders, and advocating for STEM education in Telangana's government schools.
